title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 588.5 - Designation of employees or officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 588.5 - Designation of employees or officers

State Regulations

Wherever these rules and regulations provide that a
particular agency employee or officer designated by title is to perform certain
duties, the agency may by resolution designate other or additional employee(s)
or officer(s) to perform the duties ascribed to the employee or officer
designated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
588.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
